plugin.name: PIZZAHUT
plugin.description:
This plugin parses some data from new replays, and sends the results out of a Socket (currently hard-coded to port 8080) in XML format. It was built to be used with TacoBell, the SWF plugin I wrote for XSplit, but I guess you could use this in isolation for anything.

Replay auto-save must be enabled for this plugin to work.

Source code is available on Github. This is all MIT licensed, so do what you want with it but make it free, under the same conditions (Good luck weeding out all the Pablo-specific content though). Also credit me if you get the chance :-p.
